alert.note: Alert for Riverside (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 18 at 7:42PM PDT until August 18 at 8:30PM PDT by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern La Paz County in west central Arizona... Riverside County in southern California... * Until 830 PM MST/830 PM PDT/. * At 742 PM MST/742 PM PDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located 12 miles southwest of Big River, or 15 miles southwest of Parker, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Midland and Poston. This includes CA Route 95 between mile markers 16 and 36. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
